thread.title: WATCH: Le'Veon Bell reacts to Michigan State's thrilling win over Michigan
thread.title_full: WATCH: Le'Veon Bell reacts to Michigan State's thrilling win over Michigan

title: WATCH: Le'Veon Bell reacts to Michigan State's thrilling win over Michigan
text:
WATCH: Le'Veon Bell reacts to Michigan State's thrilling win over Michigan 
Updated: 
By: CBS 21 Web Staff PITTSBURGH, Pa. -- It's been a good week for Pittsburgh Steelers running back Le'Veon Bell. 
On Monday, Bell scored the game-winning touchdown against the San Diego Chargers with no time left on the clock. The Steelers won 24-20. 
On Saturday, Bell's alma mater Michigan State pulled off another thrilling last-second victory. 
With Michigan ahead 23-21, the Wolverines lined up to punt with 10 seconds left. Michigan's punter fumbled the ball, and Michigan State's Jalen Watts-Jackson returned it 38 yards for the touchdown. 
Needless to say, Le'Veon Bell was very excited after the thrilling finish.The Steelers play the Arizona Cardinals Sunday at 1 p.m. at Heinz Field. WE ARE SPARTA pic.twitter.com/QifqlNbTum â€” Le'Veon Bell (@L_Bell26) October 17, 2015 
Photo courtesy of Lenny Ignelzi/The Associated Press Related Stories
